attributes.action: UK Passports to be made in the UK to be applied in law under security measures
attributes.additional_details:
1) your personal information is held every time you apply for a passport which include some extremely sensitive information. these could be leaked in a security breach or break in to a European country. stealing passports using your name and adding a different photo.
2) Uk jobs could be at risk in a difficult time.
3) make this law and forever keep the UK passport a UK possession.
4) only UK countries can apply to make and provide the UK passport.
attributes.background: add into law UK passports and personal information to be made and held here in the UK.
